content: this crochet pattern is free to view online on my website here https //hookedonpatterns com/crochet-blog/pixel-heart-pillow-free-valentine-crochet-pattern > also available as a free youtube > tutorial here > https //youtu be/mhnkxsywgyq the pixel heart pillow pdf pattern is available to download for a small price it includes high-quality step-by-step photographs throughout you will also receive an image-free printer friendly copy written using us crochet terms with a conversion chart to help with converting into uk terms say i love you to bits to your valentine with this pixel heart pillow i have used #5 chunky/bulky weight acrylic yarn for this project but you can use any yarn type or weight you prefer approximate measurements of my finished pixel heart pillow h 40 5cm/14 x w 36cm/16 x d 5cm/2 to calculate the approximate size of your finished pillow take the measurement of your individual square multiply by 8 for the height and multiply by 9 for the width the depth will be around the size of 1 square plus 0 5cm/0 2 gauge exact gauge is not important as you can use any yarn weight for this project use a hook size at least 1 size smaller than recommended for your chosen yarn to keep your stitches compact i have used #5 chunky weight yarn with a 5mm hook my individual squares measure 4 5cm/1 77 each you will need chunky/bulky or any weight yarn - approx 290yds of red 140yds of black and 25yds of white 5mm crochet hook or 1 size smaller than recommended for your chosen yarn toy stuffing polyester fibrefill - approx 150g stitch marker optional yarn needle scissors
